sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with tou nao feng 頭腦風 , head and brain wind . Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 2, Substance Entry yang rou 羊肉：味甘，大熱，無毒。主緩中，字乳余疾，及頭腦大風，汗 出，虛勞寒冷，補中益氣，安止驚 , “Its flavor is sweet, and it is very hot. It has no poison. It controls slowing down of the center, all ailments following delivery, as well as massive head and brain wind , sweating, depletion exhaustion, and sensations of cold. It supplements the center and augments qi, and it calms and ends fright”.
